name: Sari Ilkbahar
description:
This game id funny for short time. Game is not too long just 20 level. There are some easter eggs, teleports. Just play and FUN...

In game music made by me. (I made in game music) The level desings is easier to harder.  The harder levels absorbing you.

An hint: if you jump when go up an ramp, you will make extra jump.

Sorry my bad english. .D
